languages.text: "Вопреки моим распоряжениям они прекратили выслеживать ксеносов, отоб... рекрутировали торговое судно на Футфоле и вышли в экспедицию, конечная цель которой мне неизвестна. С тех пор сообщений о них не поступало".
"Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."
languages.original_text: "Вопреки моим распоряжениям они прекратили выслеживать ксеносов, отоб... рекрутировали торговое судно на Футфоле и вышли в экспедицию, конечная цель которой мне неизвестна. С тех пор сообщений о них не поступало".

traits.locale_text: "In defiance of my orders to continue tracking down the xenos, they seiz— they recruited a trade vessel on Footfall and went on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There's been no word of them since."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "In defiance of my orders to continue tracking down the xenos, they seiz— they recruited a trade vessel on Footfall and went on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There's been no word of them since."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "In defiance of my orders to continue tracking down the xenos, they seiz—they recruited a trading vessel on Footfall and went on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There's been no word of them since."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "In defiance of my orders to continue tracking down the xenos, they seiz—they recruited a trading vessel on Footfall and went on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There's been no word of them since."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "In defiance of my orders to continue tracking down the xenos, they seiz— they recruited a trading vessel on Footfall and went on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “他们无视我的命令，继续追杀异形，踏上了一场远征。我不知道他们要去什么地方，在那之后，也没听说过他们的下落。”
languages.original_text: "Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."

traits.locale_text: “他们无视我的命令，继续追杀异形。他们在落脚港征用了一艘商船，踏上了远征。我不知道他们要去什么地方。在那之后，我就再也没听说过他们的下落。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「異種族共を引き続き狩り続けるようにという私の要請に反して、彼らは目的不明な遠征に出てしまった。それ以来、彼らからの連絡はない」
languages.original_text: "Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族共を引き続き狩り続けるようにという私の要請に反して、彼らは目的不明な遠征に出てしまった。それ以来、彼らからの連絡はない」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «En lugar de responder a mi petición de continuar la cacería de xenos, se embarcaron en una expedición cuyo objetivo desconozco. No he recibido información sobre ellos desde entonces».
languages.original_text: "Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."

traits.locale_text: «Desafiando mis órdenes de seguir rastreando a los xenos, se apoderaron de una nave comercial en Paso y partieron en una expedición cuyo objetivo desconozco. No se sabe nada de ellos desde entonces».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Entgegen meiner Anordnung, weiter Jagd auf Xenos zu machen, sind zu einer Expedition aufgebrochen, deren Ziel mir nicht bekannt ist. Seitdem haben wir nichts von ihnen gehört."
languages.original_text: "Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."

traits.locale_text: "In Missachtung meiner Befehle, weiter Jagd auf die Xenos zu machen, haben sie auf Footfall ein Handelsschif beschlagn- rekrutiert und sind zu einer Expedition aufgebrochen, deren Ziel und Zweck mir nicht bekannt sind. Seitdem haben wir nichts von ihnen gehört."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Au mépris de mes ordres, ils ont abandonné la traque des xénos et ont embarqué pour une expédition dont j'ignore l'objectif. Depuis, je n'ai pas reçu la moindre nouvelle de leur part. »
languages.original_text: "Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."

traits.locale_text: « Au mépris de mes ordres, ils ont abandonné la traque des xénos et ont embarqué pour une expédition dont j'ignore l'objectif. Depuis, je n'ai pas reçu la moindre nouvelle de leur part. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Zeno avının sürdürülmesi yönündeki talebime karşın amacını bilmediğim bir başka yolculuğa çıkmışlar. O gün bugündür haber alamadık."
languages.original_text: "Contrary to my request to continue hunting the xenos, they embarked on an expedition whose objective is unknown to me. There has been no word of them since."
